page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: {Sherburn Hill Junior Mixed & Infant {School}takes children from 5 to 11 years.Children come from Sherburn Hill & Shadforth.There are 68 pupils divided between 3 classes,with 4 teachers & 1 part-time teacher.School has 1 field & 1 play-yard.It runs a P.T.A.{Belmont Comprehensive:Sherburn {site.}This houses the 1st year of 204 pupils in 8 classes.There are 754 pupils altogether,coming from Sherburn Hill,Sherburn,Shadforth,Rainton,Ludwor th & Belmont.Teachers travel from Belmont site.Swimming pool used by local primary schools & evening classes.It has 1 gym,2 football,1 hockey,1 cricket pitch,1 netball,3 tennis courts,1 high & 1long jump.Due to be taken over by Sherburn Primary School in September 1986.
